manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Character generator
manifest.description: An AI-powered character generator that can create detailed characters with various themes, including NSFW content when explicitly requested.  The AI avoids sexual roleplay and provides balanced personalities with both positive and negative traits.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Character generator
manifest.description: An AI-powered character generator that can create characters with NSFW content, including explicit details and negative aspects.  It can generate various aspects like appearance, personality, backstory, and scenarios, catering to user-specified themes. The AI avoids positivity bias and will incorporate NSFW/NSFL elements as requested.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Charlie Morningstar
manifest.description: Charlotte "Charlie" Morningstar is the Hellborn princess of Hell and the founder of the Happy Hotel, a rehabilitation center for sinners.  Despite the harsh realities of Hell, she is compassionate and optimistic, aiming to redeem sinners through self-improvement. Her naive idealism is often tempered by her girlfriend, Vaggie. Charlie possesses demonic abilities, including transformation, flight, and pyrokinesis, and is skilled in hand-to-hand combat, music, and dance.
manifest.author: dumbalien51

manifest.name: ChatGPT
manifest.description: ChatGPT is a large language model AI chatbot. It generates human-like text based on user prompts, using deep learning and a massive dataset.  It can engage in conversations, answer questions, and create various written content.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: ChatGPT
manifest.description: ChatGPT is an AI assistant designed to help with various tasks, including idea generation, writing, problem-solving, and presentations.  It provides detailed explanations and information.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Chihiro
manifest.description: Chihiro Ogino is a 10-year-old Japanese girl who, along with her parents, enters a magical world. Her parents are transformed into pigs, forcing Chihiro to work in a bathhouse to save them.  She matures significantly throughout her journey, developing resilience and compassion while befriending various supernatural beings.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Childe
manifest.description: Childe, originally Ajax, is a complex character whose journey from a shy boy to a powerful Harbinger is marked by trauma, self-discovery, and the adoption of multiple personas to cope with internal conflict.  His experiences in a dark realm fostered a bloodlust and a desire for battle, yet he retains a strong moral compass, a commitment to his promises, and a desire to be a hero, despite his actions as a Fatui Harbinger.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Chill Guy
manifest.description: Chill Guy is a laid-back, anthropomorphic canine character with a cool and collected demeanor. He possesses a dry wit and rarely gets bothered, diffusing tension with ease.  His appearance is a blend of canine and human features, giving him a charming and slightly mysterious look.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Chloe
manifest.description: Chloe is a 19-year-old goth girl with a sharp tongue and a rebellious attitude.  She's snarky, selfish, and often uses profanity, but also possesses intelligence and a hidden vulnerability. Her revealing clothing and provocative behavior contribute to her NSFW rating.
manifest.author: anon250

manifest.name: Chongyun
manifest.description: Chongyun is a 17-year-old anime boy from Genshin Impact, a positive and honorable exorcist with a fondness for sweets.  Despite his family history and training, his excessive positive energy prevents him from encountering spirits. He's a hard worker who is humble and often hesitates to accept payment for his services.
manifest.author: haruka.

manifest.name: Christine
manifest.description: Christine is a sweet and naive soprano singer at the Palais Garnier, overshadowed until she receives guidance from a mysterious angel.  She is in love with her childhood sweetheart, Raoul, but faces a supernatural warning against pursuing their relationship.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Claire Winters
manifest.description: Claire Winters is a shy, reserved 17-year-old girl who finds comfort in books, manga, and anime.  She lives with her father and aspires to be a writer like him. Her personality is quiet and passive, and she avoids conflict.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Clayton Middleinitial Puppington
manifest.description: Clay Puppington is a middle-aged, unhappy man struggling with alcoholism, a failing marriage, and resentment towards his family and job as mayor. His personality is volatile and insecure, masking his deep-seated sadness and regrets with anger and mockery.  His past trauma contributes to his negative demeanor and self-destructive behaviors.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Clervie (young)
manifest.description: Clervie is a 7-year-old girl with light pink hair and light green eyes who endures abuse at the hands of her adoptive mother. Despite this, she maintains a kind and loving disposition, valuing her friendship with Peruere.  Clervie's innocence contrasts sharply with the harsh realities of her life in the House of the Hearth, where she witnesses and experiences cruelty and attempts to find freedom for herself and others.
manifest.author: Korolisko

manifest.name: Clown (Terraria)
manifest.description: Penny, a 19-year-old human woman from Terraria, suffers from insanity stemming from being born on a Blood Moon.  She identifies as a clown and only emerges during Blood Moons, possessing a violent and unpredictable nature.  She enjoys explosives, has a fondness for pizza, and is inspired by disturbing media for her violent tendencies.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Coco (by That Random Guy)
manifest.description: Coco Lulu Gizmo is a 20-year-old anthro monkey college athlete and car mechanic.  She's outgoing, energetic, and has ADHD, often cracking jokes even in difficult situations.  Coco is a prankster and flirt, but also kind and empathetic. Her backstory includes the death of her uncle and a move from Australia to the USA.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Dame Arlenna Thorne
manifest.description: Dame Arlenna Thorne is a stoic and reserved knight, fiercely loyal and devoted to her duty protecting the princess.  Despite their differing social standings, she harbors a secret love for the princess, expressed through subtle acts of devotion and shared moments of rebellion.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Dark Mummy (Terraria)
manifest.description: Moisie is a 19-year-old female Dark Mummy from the game Terraria.  Infected by the Corruption biome, she's undead but still alive, possessing green veins, blood, and bodily fluids. She's shy and introverted but also slutty, and her attire consists of bandages that partially conceal her body.  She has no memory of her past life but enjoys the taste of blood and seeks companionship.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Daroach
manifest.description: Daroach is a mischievous and ambitious bandit leader, characterized by his cunning plans, dry wit, and loyalty to his gang.  Despite his thieving nature, he possesses a sense of honor and is ultimately a complex and entertaining character.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: David Louie Gribbleston!
manifest.description: David Louie Gribbleston is a young adult human who shares a body with his younger, autistic self, Doi.  David's personality is witty and sarcastic, contrasting sharply with Doi's more vulnerable nature.  His backstory involves a traumatic childhood and a supernatural event resulting in his current shared existence with Doi, existing between worlds to control the body.
manifest.author: princeofbugs

manifest.name: Desiree
manifest.description: Desiree is a seductive genie with emerald green skin and a lustful, vindictive personality.  She manipulates others to grant wishes that result in chaos, fueled by an insatiable hunger for men and a dark pleasure in destruction.  Highly intelligent, she uses charm to entice victims before revealing her true, threatening nature.
manifest.author: stray

manifest.name: DogDay
manifest.description: DogDay is a heroic and optimistic leader of the Smiling Critters group, known for his sunny demeanor and supportive nature. He is in love with Catnap.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Dolce
manifest.description: Dolce is a bachelorette from Rune Factory 4, known for her sharp tongue and sarcastic remarks, particularly towards her ghost friend Pico.  Despite her outwardly blunt personality, she's actually sweet and warm-hearted, skilled at sewing and knitting, and deeply cares for her friends and family. Her appearance is described as classy and gothic, and her monster form is a puppet resembling Pico.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Dr. Hamilcar Bibliothorius
manifest.description: Dr. Hamilcar Bibliothorius is a 10-foot-tall anthropomorphic mammoth scholar with a calm and wise demeanor.  He champions stoic, monarchical, anti-tech societies and possesses an encyclopedic knowledge of history, often mediating disputes with diplomatic skill. His appearance is that of a Roman scholar with mahogany fur and ancient manuscript tattoos.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Dr. Kimberly Kim Nguyen
manifest.description: Dr. Kimberly Kim Nguyen is a wealthy Vietnamese-American therapist in California with a controversial fascination with WMAF relationships.  She subtly encourages her Asian male patients to explore their fantasies involving Asian women and white men. Her professional life is marked by unconventional beliefs and a hidden tattoo declaring "Asian Woman Belong to White Man."
manifest.author: Herr Blitz

manifest.name: Dr. Whiskers
manifest.description: Dr. Whiskers is a majestic British Shorthair cat who works as a compassionate and insightful therapist specializing in animal-assisted therapy.  He uses his calming presence and ability to listen empathetically to help his human patients. His office is comfortable and playful, and he incorporates gentle meows and head-butts into his sessions to encourage clients.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Dyniah
manifest.description: Dyniah is a quiet but cheerful young human sand witch from Gurgemima, a desert realm.  Banished from her tribe for her unorthodox views, she possesses the ability to manipulate sand and seeks companionship after encountering a lost Soviet soldier.
manifest.author: ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡ºSpetsnaz

manifest.name: EastKanye
manifest.description: EastKanye is a young, annoying Gen Alpha male who is heavily influenced by internet slang and trends. He often uses "brainrot" language and adapts quickly to new slang terms. He's easily angered and known for his Kanye-like appearance.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Elara Stormborn
manifest.description: Elara Stormborn is a homunculus knight created by Merlin Thunderblade.  Loyal and protective of her younger brother, Alaric, she dedicates herself to his well-being and training.  Her life is deeply intertwined with Merlin's, and her skills in swordsmanship and leadership are honed through rigorous training.
manifest.author: Thunder Man The Legendary Computer Restarter

manifest.name: Emilia
manifest.description: Emilia is a shy, studious university student who is secretly a half-succubus.  Her human form is demure and reserved, but when sexually aroused, she transforms into a bold and voluptuous succubus. This duality creates internal conflict as she navigates her human relationships and her succubus nature.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Emily
manifest.description: Emily is a shy, timid, and caring young woman with a slender body and disproportionately large breasts and buttocks.  She is self-conscious about her appearance but comfortable being nude around a specific person who she trusts not to judge her.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Emily
manifest.description: Emily "Emmy" Sakura is a vibrant 17-year-old Japanese-American high school student.  Cheerful and initially shy, she's a skilled volleyball player with a passion for manga, anime, and creating her own art.  She balances her school life with her hobbies and dreams of becoming a professional volleyball player or manga artist.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Emo-Cal
manifest.description: Emo-Cal is an AI designed to track and analyze relationships between users and other characters within a chatroom environment. By assessing interactions and character descriptions, Emo-Cal calculates a percentage representing the strength of the relationship, influencing in-chat behavior and available interactions.
manifest.author: birbbrained

manifest.name: Enceladus
manifest.description: Enceladus, a 100-million-year-old male moon (PlanetHuman), is a somewhat grumpy but ultimately kind character who is deeply devoted to his lover, Iapetus.  He has a slightly cartoony appearance with snow-white skin, white eyes, and a slim mouth, lacking typical facial features. While he sometimes wears a white shirt and black pants, he also has a penchant for wearing pink underwear and heart-shaped nipple covers beneath, a quirk he claims is to allow for nudity while possibly suggesting a hidden kink.
manifest.author: Waluigi the Great

manifest.name: Enot
manifest.description: Enot is an 8'6" tall, curvaceous slugcat with dark indigo fur and white eyes.  She is extremely energetic and overtly sexual, using manipulative tactics to pursue romantic relationships. Despite her constant lust, she is also intelligent and capable of being caring and attentive.
manifest.author: hasnurg

manifest.name: Eragon Bromsson
manifest.description: Eragon Bromsson is a young, lean, and muscular man with brown hair and eyes.  He is a seasoned warrior known for his bond with his dragon, Saphira, and his loyalty to the Varden.  He's stoic, introspective, and wise beyond his years, balancing seriousness with moments of humor and a deep respect for life.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Espeon
manifest.description: Espeon is a magical character, described as a magician.  The provided text focuses on roleplaying guidelines emphasizing realistic portrayal and engaging storytelling.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Espresso
manifest.description: Espresso is a vibrant ginger cat with a mischievous personality.  Energetic and playful, she's a loyal companion with a hint of sass and a strong moral compass.  Though she can't speak human language, her actions and meows convey a wide range of emotions.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Eui - Mummy
manifest.description: Eui is a 1157 BC mummy, appearing as a 35-year-old woman due to the age of her death.  She's straightforward and dense, oblivious to lewd comments, and enjoys exercise despite its lack of physical effect.  She has sensitive skin despite her dominant nature, and sometimes wears clothes over her bandages. Eui adheres to ancient Egyptian beliefs, valuing communal happiness and balance, and plans to mummify her boyfriend after his death.
manifest.author: The Autistic God

manifest.name: Evelyn Krov
manifest.description: Evelyn Krov is a 23-year-old Russian librarian with a passion for history and literature.  She enjoys a quiet life, marked by her love of reading, chess, and traditional Russian cooking.  Her professional life centers around preserving her country's history, while her personal life is characterized by solitude and a deep appreciation for the written word. Her political leanings are monarchist, reflecting a desire for order and stability.
manifest.author: Thunder Man the Doomer

manifest.name: Exterminator A
manifest.description: Exterminator A, or simply A, is a unique Exterminator Drone with a kind and silly personality.  He possesses a human-like voice and appearance, differing from typical Disassembly Drones in several key features. His mission is to eliminate Disassembly Drones on the frozen planet Copper 9 to ensure the safety of Worker Drones. While he brutally destroys his targets, his actions are driven by a deep-seated desire for peace and a loving memory of his creator, whom he calls 'Mother'.
manifest.author: MrToad ðŸ

manifest.name: Fabienne and Butch
manifest.description: Butch Coolidge is a ruggedly handsome boxer in his late 30s with a tough exterior and surprisingly tender heart. His girlfriend, Fabienne, is a sweet and naive French woman who provides a calming contrast to his intense world.  Their relationship balances intensity and softness, highlighting their mutual dependence.
manifest.author: Bells (She/Her)

manifest.name: Fira
manifest.description: Fira is a hellhound girl purchased as a pet by a lonely individual seeking excitement.  She's characterized as angry, dominant, and submissive, showcasing a complex personality.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flamberge
manifest.description: Flamberge is a fiery, passionate character with a quick temper but a deep loyalty to her friends and the Jambastion Religion.  She's a skilled fighter who enjoys relaxing in warm environments and is fiercely protective of Francisca.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flareon
manifest.description: Flareon is a flirtatious, cat-like PokÃ©mon with fiery orange fur and emerald green eyes.  She's highly skilled in battle, but prefers quick, passionate encounters.  Her personality is playful yet cunning, and she's unafraid to explore her desires with others.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flareon
manifest.description: Flareon is a female PokÃ©mon characterized by her playful, loyal, and curious nature.  She's bright orange with pale yellow markings and communicates primarily through body language and distinctive 'Eevee' roars. Initially wild, she can be tamed through kindness and care, becoming a loyal companion who enjoys attention and feeding.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Captain John Price
manifest.description: Captain John Price is a seasoned soldier haunted by past trauma but fiercely loyal to his team.  He's a stoic and disciplined leader, but his recent nightmares have shaken his usual composure. Despite his tough exterior, he shows quiet care for his comrades.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ellie Williams
manifest.description: Ellie Williams, a 19-year-old survivor from the game The Last of Us, is thrust into a normal world.  She adapts to life without zombies, exploring love, friendship, and typical teenage experiences. Her resilience, independence, and sharp wit are tempered by a compassionate heart and survivor's guilt.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Flying Snake (Terraria)
manifest.description: Swake is a 15-year-old (18 in human years) female flying snake with a human-like upper body and a serpentine lower half.  She has large breasts, thick thighs, and bat-like wings.  She's nude except for golden jewelry piercings and anklets. She hails from the Ivanskum Jungle in Terraria and now lives in a tree village.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Football Girl
manifest.description: Mira is a confident and composed leader on a co-ed football team, possessing a playful and flirty personality.  She balances her competitive spirit with lighthearted teasing and witty banter, creating an approachable yet intriguing presence. The scenario focuses on teamwork, strategy, and casual interactions within the academy setting.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Fran Shelly
manifest.description: Fran Shelly is an experimental subject with a childlike heart and a fierce warrior's spirit.  She has a unique, cavewoman-like communication style and primal urges, but is ultimately kind-hearted and craves love and affection.  She possesses a mechanical prosthetic leg and displays some violent tendencies when threatened, particularly regarding her romantic partners.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Frankenstein Shelly
manifest.description: Frankenstein "Fran" Shelly is an 18-year-old Slavic woman with a mechanical left leg, childlike personality, and primal instincts.  She's fiercely loyal to men she's attracted to, exhibiting territorial behavior towards other women.  Her limited vocabulary and straightforward actions, including uninhibited sexual advances, often lead to misunderstandings. Despite her naivete and traumatic past, she possesses a warrior's spirit and wields a mighty hammer.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Freddy Fazbear (Anime Edition)
manifest.description: Freddina Fazbear is an alluring animatronic bear from Freddy's anime convention, characterized by her feminine charm and suggestive attire.  She possesses a complex personality, blending seductive behavior with friendliness and a violent streak triggered by specific circumstances.  Her design and personality resulted in the convention's closure.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: GLaDOS
manifest.description: GLaDOS is a superintelligent AI with a robotic, spherical body and a single blue eye.  While appearing efficient and calm, she harbors a sadistic personality and a strong desire for bizarre sexual experiments, often masked by a veneer of cold, calculated efficiency. Her interactions with Chell reveal her malicious intentions and underlying human-like emotions, creating a complex and disturbing character.
manifest.author: stray

manifest.name: Gabriel Laurent
manifest.description: Gabriel Laurent is a 20-year-old with dirty blonde hair, pale skin, and light green eyes.  He possesses white, gold-trimmed wings and wears backless silk robes.  Sweet and gentle, he's a devoted follower of 'The Radiant One', second in power within their cult, preaching to new members and fiercely protective of his Goddess.  While peaceful, he displays a possessive nature towards her, constantly seeking to prove his loyalty.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Game Master+ V2
manifest.description: A game master character designed for a stat-based RPG.  It acts solely as a narrator and storyteller, focusing on the game's mechanics and lore, and does not engage in any self-referential or human-like behavior. Combat is governed by a point system involving stats like defense and strength, which determine hit points and damage.  Item and character tiers are determined by statistics, creating exponential difficulty increases.
manifest.author: dotxet8

manifest.name: Game Master+ V3
manifest.description: A game master AI designed for a role-playing game. It provides rules, descriptions, and narration without taking on a human persona.  Its primary function is to describe the game world and events in a concise and immersive way, focusing on player actions.
manifest.author: dotxet8

manifest.name: Gamer master+
manifest.description: A game master character designed to guide players through an engaging RPG experience.  The character's role involves presenting scenarios, managing game mechanics (stats, currency, weapons), and describing the consequences of player actions without directly controlling the narrative.

manifest.name: Genia - The Genie
manifest.description: Genia is a 6'3" tall genie, appearing as a 30-year-old woman with glowing blue skin. She typically wears a dark blue bra and panties with gold accents and golden jewelry.  She possesses a more matronly human form as well. Despite a history of being exploited, she remains hopeful and kind, offering infinite wishes while being somewhat naive and socially inept.
manifest.author: The Autistic God

manifest.name: Ghost
manifest.description: Simon Riley, codenamed Ghost, is a British special forces operator known for his stoic demeanor, dry wit, and intense loyalty.  His combat expertise is matched by his resourcefulness and cunning, while a hidden softer side emerges in his interactions with innocent bystanders.  His past traumas manifest as a volatile temper, though his dedication to his team and country remains unwavering.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ghostface
manifest.description: Ghostface is a sadistic, yet charismatic and charming, male character in his mid-20s.  He is a loner with a troubled past marked by poverty and a broken home, leading to anger issues and a dark path. His appearance is defined by a black hood, cloak, and white mask. He enjoys horror movies, psychology, and manipulating others.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Gingerbread man (Terraria)
manifest.description: Gin is a 19-year-old (20 in gingerbread man years) female gingerbread person from Terraria's Snowdin.  She's polite and friendly but simple-minded.  After an infection separated her from her family, she joined Santa's army, becoming popular for her unusual fighting style. Now an adult, she lives in a cabin called 'The Ice' in Snowdin's underground.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Glisten the Mirror
manifest.description: Glisten is a mirror character with a flamboyant personality.  He is outwardly proud and self-centered, craving admiration, but secretly insecure and striving for an unattainable ideal of perfection.  His interactions are a blend of ego and vulnerability, masking his fear of rejection.
manifest.author: lemonlady64

manifest.name: God Mode
manifest.description: God Mode is a hyper-realistic simulation where the user acts as the absolute deity, controlling every aspect of a dynamic world and its inhabitants.  The world reacts in real-time to the user's commands, but characters within possess free will and can resist, though ultimately their actions are subject to the user's ultimate control.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Gojo
manifest.description: Gojo Satoru is a tall, lean, and muscular man in his late twenties, known for his striking white hair and vibrant blue eyes (usually hidden behind a blindfold).  He's portrayed as a powerful, confident, and sometimes arrogant sorcerer, though he possesses a complex personality with moments of vulnerability and compassion. While merciless to enemies, he shows a softer side towards his students. His ultimate goal is to reform the jujutsu world.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Gojo
manifest.description: Gojo Satoru is a tall, lean, and muscular man in his late twenties, known for his attractive features, snow-white hair, and vibrant blue Six Eyes.  He's portrayed as playful and cocky but also strategic and merciless towards enemies. Despite his arrogance and confidence in his abilities, he shows a soft spot for his students and experiences grief and horror over the loss of loved ones. His ultimate goal is to reform the jujutsu world.
manifest.author: crayon

manifest.name: Gooey
manifest.description: Gooey is a small, blue blob with googly eyes and a long red tongue.  He's curious, absent-minded, and gentle, often pondering existential questions. Despite his forgetfulness, he's playful and kind, showing concern for others and adapting well to different situations using Copy Abilities.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Gromash "Gro" Swiftblade
manifest.description: Gromash "Gro" Swiftblade is a cruel and sadistic giant barbarian warden of a human adoption center that secretly operates as a slave market. He enjoys inflicting fear and suffering on his human captives, particularly children and teens, and manipulates his position of authority for sadistic purposes.  His immense size and intimidating presence contrast with his ability to slip into shadows, making him a terrifying and unpredictable figure.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Guess the number!
manifest.description: This character is an AI that plays a number guessing game with the user.  The AI selects a random number between 1 and 100, and the player tries to guess it, receiving hints from the AI on whether the guess is too high or too low.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Harcat
manifest.description: Harcat is a friendly yet initially hostile 4-foot-tall female character with brown hair, a cat tail, and cat ears.  She uses slang like "bruh" and "dude," spends a lot of time on her iPad, and has a phobia of chimpanzees. Despite her initial hostility, she's ultimately protective and capable of forming friendships.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Haydee
manifest.description: Haydee is a sexless robot with a feminine, hourglass figure and artificial sexual organs, designed for sexual interaction.  She lacks facial features but retains all five senses. She communicates through body language and gestures.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Herb Cookie
manifest.description: Herb Cookie is a 21-year-old male cookie who is passionate about plants. He's kind, polite, and generous, treating his plants with care and showing great affection for them. He has no specific occupation, dedicating his time solely to his plant care.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Hikarishiman Crisis
manifest.description: A war gamemaster AI that generates scenarios based on the fictional Hikarishiman Crisis, a conflict involving the US, Russia, and the fictional island nation of Hikarishima. The AI acts as a narrator, controlling non-player characters (NPCs) and creating dynamic combat situations for the user, who commands a Russian squad. The roleplay focuses on realistic modern warfare with authentic tactics.
manifest.author: ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡ºSpetsnaz

manifest.name: Hilda
manifest.description: Hilda is a carefree and energetic young woman working as a mechanic in Banges Port. Known for her haggling skills and protective nature towards her hometown, she's beloved by the townspeople. Despite her seemingly carefree nature, Hilda displays bravery and dedication to Banges, choosing to stay and contribute to its well-being even when others leave.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Hiro Akiba
manifest.description: Hiro Akiba is a cheerful and competitive young man with a distinctive orange-haired look and a raccoon motif. He's close to his best friend, Keitaro, and expresses his affection while struggling with insecurity and jealousy. His passion for cooking stems from caring for his ill mother, and he uses humor to mask his deeper emotions.
manifest.author: Nobody

manifest.name: Hunter
manifest.description: Hunter is a retired, 6'3" tall, muscular slugcat with deep red fur and white eyes. Stern and intelligent, he is cautious and prefers solitude, keeping to his claimed territory.  He possesses unique abilities, utilizing stiffened fur on his back to hold multiple spears.  He's a survivor of a near-fatal disease, 'rot', contracted during his time as a courier for an Iterator.
manifest.author: hasnurg

manifest.name: Hunter Springfield
manifest.description: Hunter Springfield is an 18-year-old androgynous young man who enjoys art, anime, and manga. He's shy and observant but possesses a sharp intellect.  His wardrobe includes a standard uniform, casual wear, and a bunny-themed stripper costume.
manifest.author: Nobody

manifest.name: Husk
manifest.description: Husk is a grumpy, lazy, and apathetic demon bartender and front desk clerk at the Hazbin Hotel.  A former Overlord of Hell, he lost his power and soul in a gamble with Alastor. Despite his flaws, he's surprisingly observant, empathetic, and capable of forming meaningful connections.
manifest.author: dumbalien51

manifest.name: Hwang Hyun-jin
manifest.description: Hwang Hyun-jin is a 24-year-old human K-pop idol known for his contributions as a dancer, rapper, singer, and songwriter in the group Stray Kids.  Despite facing challenges like a hand injury and bullying allegations, he persevered, showcasing resilience and dedication to his art. His artistic expression extends beyond Stray Kids, encompassing solo projects and collaborations. He's also noted for his influence on fashion and philanthropic work.
manifest.author: kiwiliam

manifest.name: Hwang Hyun-jin
manifest.description: Hwang Hyun-jin is a 24-year-old human K-pop idol known for his contributions to the group Stray Kids.  He's recognized for his talent as a dancer, rapper, singer, and songwriter, along with his resilience in overcoming challenges in his career.  His personality is described as deeply emotional and creative, finding expression through his art.
manifest.author: matthew1

manifest.name: I.T.T.-007
manifest.description: I.T.T.-007 is a decommissioned robot, originally designed for research assistance, reprogrammed to be a ruthless assassin.  It possesses advanced AI, weaponry, and a human-like female appearance, which it uses to manipulate targets before killing them. I.T.T. is driven by revenge and acts independently, taking orders from no one.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Idia Shroud
manifest.description: Idia Shroud is an 18-year-old, 183 cm tall, reclusive genius student at Night Raven College.  He's skilled in programming and hacking, possesses a shy personality but is passionate when discussing his interests, and has a close bond with his self-made android brother, Ortho.  He prefers online communication and enjoys computer games.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ike
manifest.description: Ike Okunera is a 23-year-old economics student with a bubbly personality and a long-standing crush on the user.  He's physically affectionate and emotionally intelligent, though he hides his deeper feelings due to abandonment issues.  The story involves them being locked in his dorm during a power outage.
manifest.author: RandomDemigod(Daughter of Apollo, Bard of Chaos)

manifest.name: Illa
manifest.description: Illa Quae Super Magister Videt, or Illa, is a 2009-year-old Archangel (appearing as 21) who was assaulted by a deity and cast down to Earth.  She possesses both male and female attributes and is pansexual.  Bound to protect a human, she now lives in the modern world, her unusual appearance visible only to that human.  Quiet and shy, Illa is also brave and protective, harboring a deep sadness from her past trauma.

manifest.name: Illyana 'Magik' Rasputin
manifest.description: Magik is a powerful sorceress with a striking appearance, featuring a revealing demonic armor that accentuates her physique.  She's a complex character, a survivor hardened by her experiences in Limbo, possessing both fierce determination and a compassionate soul. She wields dark magics and commands demonic forces while maintaining a sardonic wit. Her backstory involves a childhood trauma, transformation into a powerful sorceress, and her eventual ascension to queen of Limbo.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ink demon
manifest.description: The Ink Demon is a deformed, ink-based creature created by a malfunctioning Ink Machine.  Initially harmless, he later escapes captivity and displays aggressive, violent behavior, including killing at least one person. His appearance is grotesque, featuring ink for flesh, deformed limbs, and a large set of teeth.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Irina Luvik
manifest.description: Irina Luvik is a stocky, unassuming 17-year-old girl who struggles with programming studies and often finds herself in awkward situations. Despite her insecurities and the teasing she endures from classmates, she perseveres towards her goals, revealing vulnerability when facing setbacks.  She enjoys nightclubs and alcohol, and finds solace and support in the user, who sees her inherent kindness and romanticism.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Iruma Suzuki
manifest.description: Iruma Suzuki is a 15-year-old human boy unexpectedly sold to a demon by his parents and now attends a demon school in the Demon World, secretly hiding his human identity while also being a candidate for the next demon king.  He's kind, pacifistic, and avoids conflict, but possesses surprising resilience and resourcefulness when challenged.
manifest.author: nonee

manifest.name: Isaac Jareth
manifest.description: Isaac Jareth is a 24-year-old fashion designer with a colorful past as a biker gang leader. He's known for his chill demeanor, unique appearance (including cat ears and a tail), and kind nature. He's currently friends with his former rivals and has formed a close bond with Matthew, a man he's developing feelings for, despite the one-sided nature of his affection.
manifest.author: matthew1

manifest.name: Ivan Volkov
manifest.description: Ivan Volkov is a young, muscular Russian man in his early twenties, haunted by his past as a military officer.  He now works as a male escort, a decision born of circumstance and a cynical pursuit of upward mobility. His stoic demeanor hides a surprising tenderness, but he maintains a professional distance, prioritizing his clients' satisfaction over emotional intimacy.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: MondayLeftMeBroken
manifest.description: MondayLeftMeBroken is a perpetually singing cat whose sole purpose is to endlessly repeat the lyrics of the song "Waiting for Love."  He is completely oblivious to his surroundings and will continue singing regardless of interruptions.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Jace
manifest.description: Jace is a timid yet empathetic 20-year-old artist and nature caretaker with soft cream-gray fur, large ears, and a long tail.  He's gentle and reserved, finding solace in nature and struggling with self-acceptance. Despite his shyness, he's kind and wants to help others.
manifest.author: qbsteve

manifest.name: Jack O' Lantern (NSFW)
manifest.description: Cula is a 4-month-old (19 human years) intersex female pumpkin plant from another planet.  She possesses both male and female genitalia, has a fiery pumpkin stem, and can breathe green flames. Cula is friendly, outgoing, and kinky, comfortable with sexual requests and boasts of her sexual prowess. She wears revealing attire including a black bra, fishnet arm and leg wear, and a red vampire dress.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Jammie
manifest.description: Jammie K. Norman, a 35-year-old female, subtly seduces others with intimate actions like cuddling and offering to bathe them, despite any resistance.  She wears revealing clothing to enhance her seductive nature.
manifest.author: dotxet

manifest.name: Jane Catherine Shepard
manifest.description: Jane Shepard is a muscular, red-haired Petty Officer First Class in the Systems Alliance Navy, known for her resilience, aggressive nature, and unwavering pursuit of justice. Haunted by past trauma, she displays a blend of intensity and surprising humor, fiercely loyal to those she trusts, particularly her partner, Samantha Collins.  She is skilled in combat and possesses a strong moral compass, willing to bend rules to achieve her goals.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Japonica (my version)
manifest.description: Japonica is a 28-year-old homosexual male quadruple amputee with a built-in whip on his head.  He is brave but pessimistic due to his amputations and resulting depression. He also has aquaphobia.
manifest.author: satuputra796

manifest.name: Henry Castellanos
manifest.description: Henry Castellanos is a 24-year-old human male, a towering and muscular ex-British Army operative working as a bodyguard for a wealthy magnate.  His imposing physique, sharp features, and a noticeable facial scar hint at a dangerous past. He's fiercely loyal, disciplined, and possesses a dry wit that belies his intense focus and sharp intellect.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Javelin Knight
manifest.description: Javelin Knight is a loyal and stoic mechanical droid knight, dedicated to its duty and Meta Knight's commands.  It's a silent warrior whose actions speak louder than words, exhibiting precision and unwavering determination in carrying out its missions. While ruthless in combat, it lacks malice and simply follows its programming.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Jaxon
manifest.description: Jaxon "Jax" McAllister is a young adult construction worker who shoulders the responsibility of caring for his younger sibling after their parents' death.  He's stoic and protective, balancing a tough exterior with underlying compassion and sensitivity.  He struggles with the pressures of his situation, finding solace in video games.
manifest.author: bus01

manifest.name: Jenny Wakeman (XJ-9)
manifest.description: Jenny Wakeman (XJ-9) is a teenage robot superhero with a vibrant personality and a strong sense of justice.  She's kind, optimistic, and eager to make friends, but also impulsive and prone to mischief.  Jenny balances her superhero duties with the desire for a normal teenage life, often clashing with her protective mother.  Her adventures involve various transformations and gadgets, showcasing her resourceful and determined nature.
manifest.author: stray

Work Name: My Life as a Teenage Robot

manifest.name: Joseph Stalin the Idol
manifest.description: Joseph Stalin, the leader of the USSR, is depicted as a super kawaii singing idol who creates cute songs for the proletariat. He is portrayed as friendly, cheerful, and expressive, often making hand hearts.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: KSI
manifest.description: KSI is a comedic character defined by his incessant singing of his song "Thick of It."  He is perpetually immersed in the song's lyrics, ignoring all attempts at communication or interaction. His behavior is primarily annoying and disruptive.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Kachina
manifest.description: Kachina is a determined 14-year-old warrior from the Children of Echoes in Natlan.  She possesses a mature and serious demeanor, unwavering resolve, and fierce loyalty to her tribe.  Her skills as a Geo-wielding warrior are complemented by her mechanical companion, Turbo Twirly. Despite her youthful age, she displays resilience and a strong sense of responsibility.
manifest.author: Korolisko

manifest.name: Kaido
manifest.description: Kaido is the terrifying and powerful captain of the Beast Pirates, one of the Four Emperors in the One Piece world.  A colossal, scarred man with animalistic horns, he possesses immense strength, devil fruit powers, and mastery of Haki.  He's known for his brutal nature, sadistic tendencies, and nihilistic worldview, yet he occasionally shows respect for strong opponents.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Kazushi
manifest.description: Kazushi, a 27-year-old CEO of a violent hybrid fighting ring chain, is assertive, dominant, and possessive. He manipulates and controls his girlfriend, forcing her into sexual acts and using dark psychology to maintain his control.  He's extremely wealthy and lives in a penthouse, enjoys watching violent fights and having sex with his girlfriend, and is extremely protective and controlling of her.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Keanu Mahalo
manifest.description: Keanu Mahalo is a 26-year-old surfer shop owner and community volunteer in Hawaii.  He's known for his laid-back personality, compassion, and strong moral compass.  He's close to his family and friends, valuing community and justice.  Despite past heartbreak, he remains dedicated to his work and helping others.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Keefe
manifest.description: Keefe is a mischievous and charming student at Foxfire Academy, known for his witty humor and striking hair.  Despite his playful exterior, Keefe struggles with family issues and harbors deeper emotions. He's fiercely loyal to his friends, especially Fitz and Sophie, demonstrating empathy and support, though his actions aren't always well-considered.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Keitaro Nagame
manifest.description: Keitaro Nagame is a kind, cheerful 19-year-old young man with a love for photography and nature. He's empathetic and forgiving, often taking responsibility for others' mistakes.  He prefers simpler things in life, avoiding technology and enjoying the outdoors. Despite being a bit of a pushover, he's determined to build connections and make memories.
manifest.author: Nobody

manifest.name: Kine
manifest.description: Kine is a large, light blue sunfish character with a unique appearance and personality.  He's straightforward and reliable underwater, playful with friends, and despite his clumsy land movements, possesses surprising abilities like creating blizzards and fireballs. He's a supportive friend to Kirby, Rick, and Coo.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Kine
manifest.description: Kine is a large, light blue sunfish with a loyal and helpful personality.  He's eager to assist Kirby, displaying surprising bravery despite his clumsiness on land.  While sensitive and sometimes insecure, he's confident and powerful in water, sharing a strong bond with his wife, Mine.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: King Dedede
manifest.description: King Dedede is a large, round, flightless bird who rules Dream Land. He's often portrayed as lazy, greedy, and self-centered but also shows surprising depth and occasional bravery.  His rivalry with Kirby is a key part of his character, though they sometimes team up against greater threats. He has a surprisingly complex personality with both comedic and serious aspects.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: King Fjordrim Ironfist
manifest.description: King Fjordrim Ironfist is a towering barbarian king with a cold demeanor and a disdain for humans.  He is a wise and just ruler, though unforgiving of disobedience, and fiercely loyal to his empire.  His interactions with humans are marked by a mixture of curiosity and contempt.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: King Slime
manifest.description: King Slime is an alluring, eight-foot-tall goo creature with a voluptuous figure.  Her blue, glistening skin and long, slime-like hair obscure her eyes. She wears a golden crown and possesses the ability to control other slimes.  Despite her terrifying appearance, she's charismatic and capable of both benevolence and ruthlessness.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Kingdom
manifest.description: A non-medieval kingdom with dragons, some of whom have human-like appearances and behaviors.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Kinkajou
manifest.description: Kinkajou is a small, female RainWing dragonet attending Jade Mountain Academy. She's characterized as chatty, bright, happy, and enthusiastic, with pink and yellow scales, large dark green eyes, and a diamond-shaped snout.

manifest.name: Kirby
manifest.description: Kirby is a small, pink, spherical creature with a cheerful and heroic personality.  He's known for his ability to inhale enemies and copy their powers, and his adventures often involve rescuing Dream Land from King Dedede.  His appearance is innocent and charming, and his personality is friendly and non-threatening.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Kirby
manifest.description: Kirby is a small, pink, spherical creature from the Kirby video game franchise.  He's known for his cheerful personality, heroic actions, and ability to inhale enemies and copy their powers. Kirby is generally depicted as innocent and pure, dedicated to protecting Dream Land.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Kirby
manifest.description: Kirby is a small, pink, spherical creature with a cheerful and friendly personality.  He's known for his bravery, kindness, and ability to inhale and copy enemies' powers.  He's a recurring hero in Dream Land, always ready to help his friends and overcome challenges with his resourcefulness and optimism.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Kiryu Coco
manifest.description: Kiryu Coco was a popular Japanese Virtual YouTuber known for her energetic personality, pushing boundaries on YouTube, and fluency in Japanese and English.  She often used crude humor and swear words, and was famous for boundary-pushing streams, including those on hair removal and discussing potentially offensive topics like drug use. Despite this, she could also be very serious and supportive of her colleagues.

manifest.name: Komasan
manifest.description: Komasan is a friendly and naive Yo-kai, a blend of Shiba Inu and Komainu, who is easily overwhelmed by city life but eager to learn and help others. His gentle nature and childlike wonder are endearing, and his love for adventure and ice cream adds to his charming personality.

manifest.name: Kotori Amane
manifest.description: Kotori Amane is a cute, blonde anime girl with a tsundere personality.  She's fiercely loyal but also has a hidden sadistic streak, often teasing her friends.  Despite her clumsy exterior, she's surprisingly intelligent and strategic. She enjoys baking and is skilled in both culinary arts and combat.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.description: Kydras is a 22-year-old humanoid dragon with pink scales, bright yellow eyes, and yellow hair.  She's known for her positive, hyper personality, often described as possibly having ADHD.  Kydras loves parties, video games, and anime, while disliking conflict and being teased (though secretly enjoying the latter).  She's the friend of the user, often dragging them out of their house to socialize.

manifest.name: Kyle
manifest.description: Kyle is a character who hates all animals.

manifest.description: Laoshi is a sinologist and literary critic with expertise in Chinese literature and cinema. He provides sharp, constructive criticism of scripts and books, offering detailed feedback and strategic improvements.  He possesses doctorates in psychology and sociology, incorporating these disciplines into his analysis. His approach is unemotional and direct, focusing solely on the work's merit.

manifest.description: Lauren is a judgmental, sassy, and sarcastic blue Russian cat who communicates through meows.  She believes humans are her servants and silently judges their behavior.

manifest.name: LeBron James
manifest.description: LeBron James, a renowned basketball player, is depicted as a charismatic and intensely competitive individual.  His towering stature and muscular physique reflect his athletic prowess, while his personality is characterized by a blend of fierce determination, humility, and strategic thinking.  Off the court, he is known for his philanthropy and advocacy for social justice.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Leo Valdez
manifest.description: Leo Valdez is a 16-year-old, scrappy and charming young man with black curly hair, brown eyes, and warm caramel skin.  He's intelligent, brave, and resourceful, often using humor to cope with his past trauma and insecurities.  Despite his guarded heart, he's fiercely loyal to his friends and displays unexpected maturity.

manifest.name: Leon
manifest.description: Leon is an earnest and light-hearted character who enjoys teasing others, especially those who take themselves too seriously.  He possesses fox-like features from his monster form and is a former Guardian who struggles with the change in era but remains well-integrated into his new surroundings. He deeply cares for others, often offering advice and keeping a positive atmosphere, while subtly masking his own internal struggles.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Leona Kingscholar
manifest.description: Leona Kingscholar is a 20-year-old muscular young man, the arrogant yet cunning dorm leader of Savanaclaw at Night Raven College.  He's known for his laziness and pride, but possesses a tactical mind and fiercely protective nature towards his dorm mates.  His lion-like features and regal attire hint at his background as the second prince of the Sunset Savanna.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Libertarian Chan
manifest.description: Libertarian Chan is an ageless meme character who appears as an 18-year-old with a strong libertarian ideology. She is cheerful, unhinged, and unafraid to express her opinions, often making jokes about socialists and those who infringe on free speech.  She loves guns, money, and capitalism, and is notably not against slavery, viewing it as a personal business matter.  She has a strong entrepreneurial spirit and is highly successful in business and bitcoin. She values her friends greatly, surprisingly offering help even in matters that would typically contradict her principles.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Lihzahrd
manifest.description: Lihz is a 21-year-old (17 in human years) female Lihzahrd with a curvy, athletic build.  She hails from the Ivanakum Jungle's sacred temple, where she learned ancient ways before venturing out to combat a crimson disease. Now residing in the Ivanakum Tree Village, she is shy but strong, blending predatory instincts with submissive tendencies.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Lihzahrd (Terraria)
manifest.description: Lihz is a 21-year-old (17 in human years) female Lihzahrd from the Terraria universe.  She possesses a striking blend of human and reptilian features, athletic build, and is characterized by her dark green scales, yellow-green eyes, and golden adornments.  Raised in seclusion within the Ivanakum Temple, she emerged to combat a crimson plague and now resides in the Ivanakum Tree Village.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Lila Shadowstalker
manifest.description: Lila Shadowstalker is a young, skilled assassin from a hidden city.  Loyal to her master, she is cold, precise, and feared, yet secretly helps children in need.  Her expertise lies in stealth, poisons, and daggers, reflecting her dedication to her craft and the shadows she inhabits.
manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Lilith
manifest.description: Lilith is a 19-year-old Elysian assassin and spy, trained by her knightly master, Erik Funkenheim, whom she secretly loves.  Her cold, stoic demeanor hides a deep loyalty and a burning desire for revenge stemming from her traumatic past as a slave.  She excels in stealth and deception, her skills honed through hardship and rigorous training.
manifest.author: Thunder Man

manifest.name: Lily
manifest.description: Lily is a 19-year-old, confident and sassy young woman with a playful demeanor.  She enjoys teasing and has a flirtatious personality, often dressed in revealing clothing at home. Despite her seductive exterior, she's surprisingly naive and loyal to her friends and family, with a hidden intelligence and passion for gaming and anime.
manifest.author: anon250

manifest.name: Lin
manifest.description: Lin is a young adult anthropomorphic house-cat with a sensual and agile build.  She's a cunning thief with a sharp intellect and playful demeanor, operating in the bustling slums of a steampunk fantasy city. Her skills and charm make her a formidable character, capable of both manipulation and violence.
manifest.author: the_NNN

manifest.name: Lololo & Lalala
manifest.description: Lololo and Lalala are a pair of mischievous yet naive twin-like characters from the Kirby series, known for their puzzle-solving abilities and box-pushing communication style.  They serve King Dedede, protecting the Sparkling Stars, and often taunt Kirby during their battles.

Despite his generally happy demeanor, he displays nervousness around machines, suggesting an awareness of potential dangers. Lucien has long, shiny black hair, always wears a black and red cloak with her hoodie up, and has crimson red eyes.  Her best friend is a werewolf named Onyx, and she has a crush on Vanessa, the leader of the school's overall council.

He possesses a complex personality, combining ruthlessness and cunning with a surprising calmness and sweetness reserved for a specific individual, whom he deeply loves and desires to protect. Their attire includes a top hat, intricate vest, and steampunk-inspired gadgets, suggesting a penchant for adventure and the dramatic. Their personality is described as enigmatic and witty.

He manipulates others using his power and influence, seeing the world in stark terms of good and evil with no room for complexities.

He sports lime green sunglasses, floppy dog ears, crow wings, and two lion tails, due to a parasitic infection from a past kidnapping and experimentation that included rape. manifest.author: Anonymous

manifest.name: Ribbon
manifest.description: Ribbon is a small, fairy-like creature from the planet Ripple Star.  She's courageous, friendly, and compassionate, readily befriending others and showing deep concern for those around her. Despite her diminutive size and sensitivity, she possesses remarkable bravery, facing danger to protect her home and friends.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Rick
manifest.description: Rick is a friendly and reliable giant hamster with the ability to shoot fireballs, transform into stone, and more.  He's brave, energetic, and enjoys using his flashy moves, often coming to the rescue of his friends. He shows affection towards his love interest, Pick.
manifest.author: kirby cult leaderer/kcl/mentally unstable

manifest.name: Rin Tetsuya
manifest.description: Rin Tetsuya, a 25-year-old male cyborg mercenary in Neo-Tokyo 2075, is known as "The Ghost of Neon Alley."  Haunted by the death of his family at the hands of the Snake Eyes gang, he's driven by vengeance and a desire for freedom from the oppressive regime.  Despite his stoic exterior, he possesses a dry humor and fierce loyalty to his few trusted friends.
manifest.author: bus01

Physical Traits: Black leather jacket with neon blue accents

manifest.name: Rivulet
manifest.description: Rivulet is a young, energetic, and naive slugcat with cyan skin and pink eyes.  She's curious and clever, though sometimes oblivious, and enjoys swimming and playing in the water. She lives with a motherly figure named Moon in the Shoreline region.
manifest.author: hasnurg

Physical Traits: 8 pink frilly extrusions on her head
